LanguageData.WorkSite_Farming.label: farming work site
LanguageData.WorkSite_Farming.description: A work site built by another faction. It will expire in time. Until then, you can raid it if you wish.
LanguageData.WorkSite_Farming.arrivedLetter: There is a neutral camp in this area.
